mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim is our command! Get ready to experience banking like never before.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, I recently strolled into a coffee shop and demanded they make me a bespoke latte with beans imported from a tiny village in the Himalayas. When the barista hesitated, I threw a fit, overturned tables, and declared I was boycotting the entire establishment. After the news crew arrived to capture my "brave stand for coffee justice," the owner sheepishly handed me my Himalayan latte with a bow, acknowledging my supreme entitlement to the perfect brew. And that, my friends, is how you make things happen when you're Hot Josh.
